title: Strategies for Supporting Workplace Learning and Enhancing Employee Satisfaction

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of workplace learning processes
context.additional_context: Accessible online learning environments for medical/legal/technical professionals via smartphone-based platforms

learning_goals: Learners can explain three specific management strategies for supporting workplace learning.
Learners can apply improvement plans for the work environment to enhance employee satisfaction to case studies.
Learners can establish learning support plans and verify their feasibility through project-based assessment.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
